item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with hats and songs. Lots of fun and insight about yourself and those important to you.

7:30 pm - 9:30 pm
($40 - Sliding scale to $20)

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and has taught 2000 workshops on this topic. He is a therapist and personal coach and he is coming out with a new eBook soon on Herb's Tips for Living: A Manual for Enjoying Yourself on the Earth.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop - new format with Songs!
